11213112.content:
You were already a little nervous sneaking in here. You’d always been a good kid, and have never broken the rules before. But you just had to see the horsies up close! Still, when you heard footsteps coming up behind you while you were distracted by the mares, you just about had a heart attack. “Hello there, little one,” you hear. You turn around to see a young woman towering over you, wearing a flannel shirt and jeans as she smiled down at you. “No need to be afraid. I’m not angry that you snuck in here. In fact, I’m glad to see a new face. I’m sure many of the mares are, too.”

“Wha…?” You blink, still shaking with adrenaline a bit as you looked up at her, but you calm down when you realize she wasn’t mad at you. Your mind immediately turns back to the horses you saw, so you can’t help but start asking questions as she stands by your side. “What is this place…?”

“This is the Mother Mare Ranch,” she explains, patting your back. “We don’t operate for profit. Instead, we find very special mares. The most generous mares in the world, with hearts full of love. And we bring them here, where their kindness won’t be taken for granted.”

You look at the mares. At first you just noticed their height, but now, you're noticing their expressions. They all seem so loving indeed, cuddling happily with the kids in their stables. But… why were those youngsters there in the first place? What kind of a ranch was this? “Why are all these kids here…?”

“The same way you came here. Little ones who need someone to take care of them, always end up finding their way to this ranch,” she said. “Almost as if it’s fate.”

You couldn’t even wrap your head around that! The idea that some kids were just destined to come to this ranch… that couldn’t be true, could it? Another detail caught your attention, though. “... take care of them…?”

She sighs. “Not all children have very good mommies and daddies. Some children don’t even have any parents at all. Nobody to care for them,” she explains. Seeing that you don’t understand, she continues. “Tell me. Do you feel like you are being taken care of?”

You pause, thinking about your home life and suddenly feeling pretty gloomy. “... well… I don’t know… my mom and dad do fight a lot…” You say. The more you reflect on it, the worse your parent’s neglect is. “A lot of the time… it feels like they don’t even care about me…!”

She smiles, gesturing to the mares in front of you. “Well, these mares certainly care about you. They have enough love for every little one in the world!”

You stare at the lovely mare, almost envious of the kids in the stalls. Surely, those mares were taking care of them in just the way your parents never did… “So these mares… they take care of kids?”

“Mhmm,” she nods. “Each little one chooses a mare, and then spends the rest of the day with them, relaxing, having fun and learning about eachother. At the end of the day, they decide if they truly want the mare to become their mother.”

You squint your eyes in confusion. “Become their mother…?”

“If they decide so, the mare will take them into their womb, where they will truly become her child,” she says. “Then, she shall care for them for the rest of their days.”

You had absolutely no idea what she was talking about! Heck, you didn’t even know what a womb was. “So she… turns them into a horse?”

The woman laughs. “Hehe! Well, yes, I suppose so. But it isn’t nearly as scary as it might sound!” She smiles, gesturing to a few mares whose stalls aren’t occupied. “I suggest you give it a try! Pick and mare, see if you like her. You can leave at any time if you change your mind…” You bite your lip, hesitating. Well… if you can change your mind at any time... guess there’s no harm in giving it a try, right? But what sort of mare should you choose?

131.content:
In all your years on Earth, you’ve rarely strayed more than a few towns away from your precious ranch. In fact, you doubt you’ve ever even left the state.

Before you were even born, Grey Valley Orchards was run like a well-oiled machine. People worked under you that you didn’t even recognize, and you got the feeling that the place would keep on running just fine if you suddenly ceased to exist.You can’t remember the last time something new happened, or you met anyone interesting, or anything brought an ounce excitement to your boring little rural life. Even in your dating life, your money was a curse; all your potential lovers were only interested in you for your money, and were quickly driven away by your lifestyle after a few years. Thus, even in your ripe age, you lived alone in the same small cabin in the corner of the farm, languishing in mundanity.

Every generation adds some new novelty to the ranch. Your great grandfather, for example, bred the best racing horses in the country right here on the farm, and you still owned a few horses yourself for pulling plows, wrangling cattle on the wide-open fields, and occasionally just renting them out for riding. You’ve been trying to come up with some new enterprise to tackle yourself… and you think your answer has just fallen into your lap. Just a few weeks ago, when one of your clients rented a mare for a day-long session of riding, he never came back. You thought he just stole her, until a week later, the mare found her own way back to the farm, suddenly looking extremely pregnant. It didn’t take you long to figure out what had happened. Apparently, your client had intended to do more to the mare than take her for a simple ride, but bit off more than he could chew, and somehow ended up trapped in the poor gal’s womb! The look of humiliation on his face as you pulled him out was more than punishment enough, and you thought you could forget about the whole crazy event soon after.

Something was stuck on your mind, however. While researching ways to free the poor bastard, you stumbled upon all sorts of pictures of people inside horses’ wombs and bellies, and eventually you realize they were doing it on purpose. Apparently, for whatever reason, when it comes to horses, oxygen and stomach acid isn't a problem ‘in there’, so these perverted folks can embark on a different kind of ‘horse riding’ whenever they please, provided they have somebody else around to pull them out. You feel like you should be disgusted, but when you realized how passionate they were, all you could see was dollar signs. Some of these people - vorarephiles, they call themselves - were offering extravagant amounts of money to rent out a ‘special’ horse riding session for even a few hours. Your mind reels at the possibilities. Your farm boasted dozens of horses, of all shapes and sizes; imagine what sort of operation you could run! It was certainly a more interesting proposition than selling sunflower seeds, at least.

You scrolled through their forums on your laptop while curled up in your cozy bed late at night, amused and fascinated by their unorthodox passion. From what you could tell, it seemed genuinely harmless, and you were entertained by the things they came up with. Photos of a woman riding her prized shire mare around while her husband naps inside its womb... a video of a ‘sheriff’ using a stallion’s belly as a makeshift prison for an infamous ‘bandit’... the more you browsed, the more it just seemed… fun! As you finally slide your laptop to the side and lay back in bed, your mind continues buzzing with all the possibilities. You have definitely come to decide that this is a niche you want to get in on. Exploring, and cornering the market of, something so new and obscure would definitely break up the monotony of your daily life…

But first thing's first... what's your name?

Throughout the day you feel like someone is definitely watching you but there's no sign of anyone around.....nothing human that is. You're cleaning up mostly spider webs and layers of dust. The house does have a cellar that is accessed through a slanting door not too far from the house just like any storm cellar. The cellar contains three rooms; One seems to be a living area and the other two rooms are small bedrooms with nothing but a short stack of hay for bedding. Since nobody has lived on the ranch it's naturally overgrown with grass and trees....in fact the house was hard to find because of all the trees around it.

As evening approaches you're totally exhausted having worked all day so you collapse onto the couch in the living room and fell asleep.

133.content:
Groggily, your eyes fumbled open to reveal the slowly clearing image of your alarm clock. The wonderful dream you were having – which involved you relaxing on a tropical island very far away from here – had crumbled around you thanks to it’s dreadful, intrusive ringing. You had half the mind to reach over and smash the thing to bits, but you realized doing that wouldn’t change anything.

With an annoyed groan, you reached across to the nightstand and flicked the device’s off button, it’s horrid screeching falling silent with a soft click. Next, you peeled away the warm covers and began forcing yourself from your comfy bed. You shivered slightly as both bare feet met the cold wooden floor, and felt the desire to fall back into the comfort of your mattress gnawing in the back of your head. Begrudgingly, you pushed it aside and made your body stand, before slowly waddling over to your wardrobe. You began sorting through your clothes, quickly picking out a few clean pieces, and spared a pessimistic glance at your work timetable, hung upon your room’s door, as you put them on.

New Day Farms was your current place of both work and residence. A farm of great fame and prestige, know the world over for it’s many award-winning horses, you figured it would be a steal working there. You always had a strange soft spot for horses since you were little, even though you hadn’t gotten the chance to be around them much. So surely bagging some experience and college cred while also getting to hang out with those majestic beasts would be a great way to spend your summer, right?

Not even a full two weeks later, you had come to view accepting the job as the biggest regret in your entire life.

You had been assigned to two particular horses: the riding mare, Jackie, and the show mare, Glitter. Of the pair, you much preferred Jackie.

Jackie was loyal and affectionate, quick to nuzzle and comfort you when she sensed your mood was down. You would feed the chestnut mare, and ride with her around the farm whenever the customers were few and far between to keep her body active. If things had stayed like that, being with Jackie would have made the job bearable. But it didn’t stay that way; soon you were asked to do strange things: to strip down to your boxers and cover yourself in oats before letting Jackie lap away at you, or laying down and letting Jackie park her huge rump right on your face, pucker only a few insignificant spaces from your nose. Jackie seemed to have mixed feelings about these activities; she always seemed reluctant to begin, but once she had, she appeared to enjoy herself, as she’d let slip a few soft nickers of delight.

Glitter, on the other hand, was the horse equivalent of a rich snob. Always holding her head so high, the pure-white coated mare looked down at you like you were less than her – though considering the vast collection of trophies and medals adorned with her name that decorated the farm, you couldn’t really begrudge her for believing that. Glitter’s training was never something you were involved in; you were purely there for her cleaning. At first, it was simple: wash her, brush her fur, shovel away her waste. But soon you were asked to do things you really didn’t like: to shove your hand into her anus and clean from the inside, or to brush her teeth with your head in her mouth, bombarded by her hot breath and the echoing noises from deeper within her body. Glitter always seemed happy during and after these disgusting activities, as occasionally you’d catch her with a satisfied, but still wanting, look shining in her eyes as she watched you leave.

You shudder again as you recall those nasty events. Not only born from disgust, but also from a certain rising in your pants. A part of you can’t possible like this sort of stuff, can you? You shake your head, flinging away those thoughts and feelings at least for now, and finish putting your clothes on.

Done, you march towards the door, and look again at your timetable, silently absorbing the name of the mare you’ll be with today. Today, it seems you would be taking care of…

You pat Jackie softly on the side of her head. “How about we go for a ride together, aye Jackie?” You asked. The farm hadn’t had many visitors lately, so Jackie probably hadn’t been getting out very often. It was sad picturing this lovely and energetic horse all alone in her stall, waiting for a ride that just wasn’t coming. The least you could do for her was help her get some exercise.

The mare eye’s lit up like a star at you suggestion, and eagerly she nickered in agreement. Happy the she was happy, you moved to the bag of riding gear which dangling from the pillar beside her stall. Taking her saddle in hand, you shuffled back over to Jackie, and fitted it onto the mare as gently as you possibly could. Jackie watched you do so without complaint, her gorgeous eyes absorbing your every move as you worked.

The final sinch of the final strap, you pull back a bit to admire your handwork. Jackie nickered happily again, and waltzed around the stall in a small circle, as though she were a fashion model showing off her outfit to a non-existent crowd. You couldn’t help but chuckle at the display.

“Wow. Looks like someone wants give Glitter a run for her money.” You commented as the mare came to a stop in front of you. Jackie made an action of mock offense, raising her head back and softly snorting. You couldn’t tell if it was from being viewed as second best to the other mare or if it was from being compared to Glitter in the first place.

Again, you chuckled. Now that the jokes were done, it was time to get down to it. You pulled the riding helmet from the gear bag and strapped it to your head, before hoisting yourself up onto Jackie’s waiting back without issue. When you were first starting out riding Jackie, getting yourself into the saddle was a great hassle; now it was practically second nature to you. You guess you had Jackie to thank for that, being so patient with your inexperienced self and all.

You reached down to caress your partner’s mane. “Alright, girl. Just around the stall for a littl-”

Jackie was off before you could finish. Easily, she sailed over the stall’s boundaries and sped towards the stable doors, towards the tiny gap in the middle that lead to the world outside. She burst them loudly open with her great strength and the built-up momentum, and without so much as a hitch was off into the great outdoors. The rain lightly danced upon her face and the fog above muted the warm sun, but that didn’t dishearten Jackie in the slightest.

Frantically, you clung to the mare as she soared through the rain like an avatar of the very wind itself. “W-woah, woah, Jackie! Woah, girl!” You called out to her, struggling to keep her flowing hair out your mouth as you spoke. Maybe she heard or maybe she didn’t; regardless, it didn’t seem like she had any plans on stopping anytime soon.

You decided to let her have this. She must have been positively brimming with unspent energy from all the time spent cooped up in her stall. No one, human or animal, was out in the field right now. It was just Jackie, and you along with her for the ride. So why not let her have her fun? You steered yourself, and continued to cling tightly to her.

Eventually, after what felt like half an hour bouncing up and down on Jackie’s back, you could feel the mare begin to slow down. Good thing too, you were close to running out of strength to keep holding on. She calmed herself down into a more peaceful pace as she slowly trekked towards a nearby tree. With the wind now weakened and the bouncing subsided, you could hear her labored breathes loud and clear, and beneath your hands feel the frantic beating of her heart.

Beneath the tree, free from the gentle bombardment of the rain, Jackie gave a ragged grunt and shook herself. Instantly you could tell she was asking you to get off, so you did, and come to sit with your back against the tree. Jackie walked around for a little bit, before settling down beside you, close enough for you to easily stroke her mane and neck if you so wanted. Despite the soreness in your arms from clinging for so long, you did so to the best of your currant ability, and felt Jackie affectionately lean into your touch.

The two of you sat there in the relative quiet of the outdoors for a good while, listening to the subdued pitter-patter of rain mixed together with each other’s gradually stabilizing breathes. You looked at her, and saw her looking back at you, and you knew for certain that if everyday were like this, you would never want to leave New Days Farm.

Then, a certain sound tore you from your thoughts.

You blinked and raised an eyebrow. “Just… say hello to her?” You ask in disbelief. That couldn’t be it. There had to be something more to this. “That’s it?”

14.content:
Life is full of surprises, you know that more than most, just a few months ago you where living in the small city of Viera and now you're looking to buy a ranch in Pennsylvania. It all started with the end of your third relationship in the past two months because you "weren't dedicated to it" as your ex's say, that along with the realization that college was nothing but a money trap to you lead to your want to get away from it all, to escape the chaos of modern life. So you spent your spring break in a small rural farming town alone, but as your break was coming to an end you found yourself looking at real estate instead of plane tickets. So now, here you are parked at a turnoff of some dirt road, hidden from the world under the light shade of old trees, waiting for your Realtor as the radio hums a quiet tune. It's been almost two weeks since you decided not to finish the semester and stay here yet despite it being a rash decision you've never been more happy, but there's a small problem. You're still living out of the same motel that you stayed in during spring break, and that trend seems to be going to continue as all the properties your Realtor has shown you that's in your price range - which isn't a lot- are, well, trash. They're either too close to the rumble of the interstate or crammed between larger properties and way too close to town. This is possibly the last plot of land in the zip code you haven't seen, and with the way things are going you might not get to see it. You had a tour scheduled for noon and you're still alone.

You glance at the red LEDs of your car's clock to watch as 12:59 becomes one o'clock, then 1:20, 1:30, and 1:40. You pull your seat's side leaver up and lean back with a *groan* as old strings stretch and gears grind together letting the backrest slowly bend back. You glance back to the clock to see that yet another minute has faded away. You spin the knob of your radio to stop the bombardment of advertisers that has over ran the soothing melodies of earlier. After spinning through the spectrum you stop on an ad for your Realtor, an announcer boldly says: "Looking to sell or hoping to find that dream house of yours? Then stop on in to Queens Realtors! Our dedicated staff can help you find whatever you're looking for, just call..." *click* the radio shuts off as you open your door and climb out. "Help you find your dream house" you repeat mockingly as you role your shoulders and look at your worn out car. Your mind is blank as a creeping suspicious of panic craws in your thoughts. Without hesitation you do a 180 and scan the woods for movement - you see nothing. Your mind now is haunted by this feeling of being watched and you freeze as the image of you turning back around to your car to see a huge beast with sharp yellow teeth and big black eyes sitting on your car enters your imagination. With a hard swallow and a clenched fist you turn back around to the car, only to see the still locked gate and the overhanging sign reading "JOHNSTON FIELDS" in old rotten wooden letters. You feel like a fool for getting so worked up over nothing but as you lean back against the side of your car you still can't shake of feeling of something watching you.

1423.content:
Under the cover of old oaks you wonder your way up a steadily climbing road. The smell of damp earth and the gentle rustle of leaves in the breeze are your only companions as the road curves into an opening in the tree line. The road ends at a sudden stop marked by only a dilapidated shed with broken dirty windows, and a rusted out metal roof. "The perfect garage" you think as you imagine what it could look like after a little repair as you walk over to examine it. Tracing your fingers over the rough texture of the wood as you pass along the side of it you come across a side door with the same dirty cracked windows as the front doors have. You reach down to try the handle only to see that the lock had been cut out from the door. Curious to explore you push it open with a long stuttering creak and are immediately greeted by a gush of hot dry air and the smell of mildew as particles of dust float freely from the confines of the gloomy interior. Stepping inside you find a world lit by rays of sunlight as they gleam though holes in the roof. Setting the floor a flame with oranges and browns as years of dust are stirred into the air as life awakens the still air inside. You stop a few steps in and look down upon a rusted pair of horse shoes. You close your eyes to breath in the moment and a feeling to home swelled up inside you. You have found your dream.

Wishing to explore more of your new residents you slowly wonder back to the door and the outside world. Your vision is gone for a moment but as it returns you notice something new - a dirt walking path almost lost to the forest after years of disuse. But there is more to explore as you walk back to the driveway you see the roof of a farmhouse peeking above the top of the remainder of the hill the you the road ends on. Running for a moment to the top you hunch over with closed eyes before stretching as you inhale a deep breath. Your jaw almost drops at what you see after opening your eyes to not only the farm house but also a barn, stables, three massive fields, and far far away a lake of cool blue water all receding from your view in a slightly sloping valley. You stare in disbelieve as the idea that all this could be hidden from view by just a few lines of trees form the rest of the world. Then reality hits you like the end of a dream; the quietness - something was wrong . The world was silent, as in dead quiet ever since you first hopped the gate there hasn't been a sound from another living thing. No animals, no birds, no flies, simply nothing, even the breeze seemed to have stopped making noise. With this revelation that nagging feeling of something else being there with you, watching you, clinging to you like a shadow returned. "I can't just stand here" you say out loud trying to snap yourself out of that train of thought. "I need to get my bearing in this place before I lose it" you say before walking off...

You watched in horror as the dog's back legs were bent at an unnatural angle to more easily slide into the mare's greedy rear, and you faintly hear light snapping sounds as the horse's muscles readjust to fit their unexpected guest. By the time you got back up, it was already too late.

To your horror, you watched as the rear half of the mares gut bulged and pulsated, realizing the poor, poor dog was still alive inside. You desperately tried to wedge her anus back open and drag the dog out, but her sphincter still wouldn't give up it's prey. "Let him out! Let him out!", you were still screaming, the smell no longer affecting you.

As the bulges coming from her abdomen slowed and eventually ceased, you laid your head on your horse's back, shocked and dejected, still slightly in disbelief that your average-sized horse could fit the whole dog up it's rear. Rosie looked back at you, looking sorry at how it had affected you, but not necessarily remorseful at what she had done.

It was time to call the vet.

***

"Mmhm. And just how big was this dog?"

"I don't know, uh, 50 pounds or something." You replied, your voice still shaking.

"Did the horse display any signs of discomfort or pain following the... insertion?"

"Uh, no. Not at all, that I've seen. Could you just tell me how to get the dog out?"

"It's been around fifteen minutes or so from the time of the incident, as you said, correct? In that case, the dog would've already been moved into the horses stomach. You don't have to worry, your horse's stomach is fully capable of digesting the husky and no retrieval will be necessary."

"Yeah, well... I kind of want the dog back. Alive."

"I apologize, but in enclosed, airless spaces, the average animal suffocates within minutes. It is likely too late for the dog."

You lean back into the couch, squeezing your eyes shut, trying not to let yourself cry.

"So, has your horse displayed any other relevant unusual behavior lately?" The veterinarian asked, interrupting your moment of sorrow, which you were rather relieved by.

"What? O-oh, no... I mean, kind of. They never really liked each other. The horse and the dog, I mean." You state, keeping yourself under control, under you finally exclaim in exasperation, "Doctor, please! Why... why did she do this? How did she do this? Is there something wrong with her?"

"No, don't worry, there's nothing wrong with her physically. All horses of her size have this kind of... 'ability'." The vet consoled you. You heard a crack, as if he was leaning forward in his chair, before he came out and fully explained the situation to you.

"See, your horse is enduring a phenomenon common among large animals, which is the urge to insert smaller, suitable animals into the anus- and, in turn, the stomach- as opposed to a more conventional dietary choice, as they find it more healthy and pleasurable. This was a common occurrence in prehistoric time, but as humans domesticated the native species, we bred this natural urge out of their gene pool. However, this urge can come flooding back to many horse species if they happen to 'swallow' a smaller animal accidentally somehow. Some of the more common original incidents include things like small birds crash-landing, desperate squirrels thinking they've found a place to hold up for the winter, or, in one case, an unlucky boy in a tragic skateboard-related accident. The chances are your mare has been doing things like this for quite a long time."

You choked up in shock and surprise as he explains this all to you. Could this be real? Was this all some kind of horrible, horrible joke?

"S-shes my signature trophy horse. I can't have her doing... this. Is.. is there any way to stop this urge?"

"Well, yes. If you keep her under constant surveillance and isolation for a period, feeding her only artificial and more natural horse food, to wean her off of her new 'diet', the urge will eventually subside."

"And how long will this take?"

"One or two months."

Your eyes widen.

"Two months? Racing season is right around the corner! I had a critical competition scheduled in a week!"

"Now slow down, now. This 'diet' isn't necessarily unhealthy for your horse. Quite the opposite, in fact. Some of the most successful racing horses practiced this almost exclusively for it's benefits to nutrition and morale. If you decide to support this diet, at least until racing season is over, your horse will continue to be at tip-top shape unabated. The question is, are you willing to face the moral consequences?"

You paused, considering it. You didn't want to support... whatever this 'diet' was, but Rosie was your signature race horse, and your primary point of pride and profit. You couldn't afford to miss this racing season.

After a few minutes, you make your decision.
154232.title: Help the dog!

choices: Buy some animals off the market (easy, but costs)
Use livestock or wild animals (free, but difficult)
1542321.content:
"What do you mean, 'support this diet'?", you ask, with a tinge of disgust in your voice.

"Regularly 'feeding' animals to the horse should keep it extremely healthy. Most owners tend to feed them either farm animals they already own, or wild animals they manage to catch. Alternatively, companies like the PPFE can provide small animals in bulk for low prices."

"What? You want me to actually feed my horse more animals? That's awful!"

The veterinarian paused for a moment. "You owned a dog, right?"

"... yeah, why?"

"And I presume you fed that dog, well, dog food? Food made of things like red meat, freeze-dried beef, the like?"

"Well, of course, but-"

"That dog food is generally made out of the exact same animals you'd be 'feeding' your mare. There's no real moral difference. The only question is is if you have the stomach to handle the... 'feeding' process."

You furrow your brow. "... I guess you're right."

"So have you made your decision?"

You lean back into the couch, thinking about it for a while. You look at your situation, and can't help but chuckle a bit. You can't believe you've found yourself discussing something like... this, so casually. "Yeah, I think... I'll support this 'diet', if it really has the benefits you say it does. I mean, at least until racing season is over."

"Excellent. I'll put in a word at the PPFE in case you decide to contact them. Is that all?"

"I guess it is, yeah."

"Well alright then. Glad I could've helped. Goodnight, miss."

You put down your phone, and sit on your couch, glancing occasionally at your television screen, spending the next few hours trying to comprehend just what you've gotten yourself into. Eventually, you fall back to sleep.

It was a bit late in the afternoon of a very busy day. The crops were all taken care of, the equipment had been maintained, the tractor fixed up, and all the animals had been fed... except one. You'd been watched her all day, in the corner of your eye. You'd seen how she'd eyed the chickens, and how she glanced longingly at the nearby forest that you assumed was her main source of prey. The husky from last night was a large meal, so it lasted her a while, but she was obviously getting hungry again, by now.

You leaned against against a beam next to her stall.

"You hungry, girl?"

She looked at you, as if she was surprised that you were even acknowledging her after what she did.

"Don't worry, Rosie. I understand everything.", you console the mare, "In fact, I'm gonna get you something good to eat right now. Just don't shove any of the livestock up your rear unless I tell you to, ok?"

She looked surprised for a moment, but then pleased that you came to see things from her perspective. She nodded, intrigued.

"That's a good girl." You smile, ruffling her mane with a hand, and walked off.

You considered the options the veterinarian advised to you last night. You could buy some small animals off the market, or you could just use livestock or wild animals from around the farm and save money, in the short term. What do you eventually decide on?
1542321.title: You support her new 'diet'

15423212.content:
You figure that feeding Rosie right away with some of your currently owned livestock should suppress her voracious tendancies at least for now. Mulling over which animals would be consididered good feed to start with, your eyes fall upon the pig pen. The larger swine may be too large, you don't know what Rosie is capable of consuming at this point. Going the safe route, you choose the three recently born piglets as today's meal. Their sizes are relatively near the size of the dog, if not smaller but more rotund in shape, but with three of them you figure it would suffice.

"Alright Rosie, lunch is coming," you say to yourself as you walk toward the pen.

Entering the pit, you find the mother of the piglets, a rather large sow, laying on her side and nurturing her young. The three piglets were eagerly drinking up the milk provided to them. The three were the survivors of a small batch of 6 piglets, the other three who died shortly after birth. With such a small gain in potential meat, you figure it'd be more productive to feed your mare instead of putting the effort into growing or selling the piglets. You reach down toward them and pick up the first of the three piglets. The piglet gives off small weak squeals as you carry it to Rosie.

You walk up to the mare with the small animal in your arms and say,"Hey there big girl, I've got dinner. Hope you like pork."

The horse perks up after seeing her new meal. She eyes the small animal before staring back at you.

"Don't worry, I've got two more after this one." You say to her. After hearing this, she lets out a neigh of joy, happy knowing you are sparing nothing to help her diet.

Moving towards the back of the mare you tell her,"Okay girl, stand still." You know first-hand how stretchy the mare's anus was, and with the already squirming piglet still lubed with mud(a little couldn't hurt the mare, could it?) the piglet was ready for insertion. You pull aside Rosie's tail.

The poor piglet was cut off mid-squeal as you inserted it in your horse's ass, but you could still hear a faint cries just beyond the mare's walls. Placing more pressure on the piglet's behind, you start inserting more of it inside. Suddenly the piglet lurched forward, you take your hands off it as Rosie's body takes its meal inside almost entirely on its own. The piglet almost sped past Rosie's anus as even a small push sent the piglet nearly entirely in, with only it's little pig feet just beyond the pucker of the mare. 154232121.content:
That wasn’t nearly as disgusting or disturbing as you thought it would be. You had been agonizing in anticipation of this moment for hours, but now that you had actually done it, it was actually strangely fascinating. You can’t help but smile in bemusement as Rosie lifts up one of her hind legs, clenching the muscles in her abdomen and savoring the feeling of the smaller animal being squeezed deeper and deeper into her body.

You pat the mare’s side on the spot where you assume the piglet is, feeling the fat of her stomach and her silky white fur. Though you were loathe to admit it, you were definitely enjoying yourself.

Finally, Rosie lowers her leg and flashes you an expectant look, showing that she was ready for more.

You saw one of the piglets was curled up, slumbering peacefully on the ground, completely oblivious to the squealing of its sibling. It wriggles a bit when you pick it up, but slips back to sleep as you cradle it gently against your chest. It was so adorable, you hesitate for a moment… before the hungry look on Rosie’s face spurs you back into action.

“Hold your horses, girl, it’s coming,” you laugh as you walk around to the mare’s hindquarters, careful not to wake the piglet in your arms. Carefully, you raise the piglet up and press it’s snout gently against the mare’s stretchy anus, which spreads with incredible ease around the smaller animal’s head.

You work this piglet in much more slowly than the last one, mostly just to tease the mare. Rose instinctively lets out a noise that could almost be called a ‘purr’ as you slipped the animal deeper into her greasy rectum. Her rear end was somehow completely clean, you noticed -- which was good, because you weren’t wearing any gloves.

She looked over her shoulder at you, smiling and biting her lip in anticipation. You didn’t even think it was possible for a horse to be this expressive, but she was obviously enjoying herself, and she let it show.

You still couldn’t help but be stunned by how easily the mare’s ass accepted its huge, lively meal. This was obviously a natural talent of Rosie’s, and judging by the expression of sheer pleasure on her face, you couldn’t help but be a little jealous.

Absentmindedly, you wonder how much of your own body would be able to fit inside the mare.

By this point, the piglet was starting to rouse from its slumber, and was squirming a bit. This came far too late, of course, as you had already lodged its upper body in Rosie’s derriere, leaving only its rear end and hind legs kicking futilely in the breeze. Rosie let out a deep, gutterly neigh of pleasure as the piglet started wriggling.

You pull back, watching as the mare’s plump ass flexes and undulates around its prey. You decide to let Rosie ‘swallow’ this one on her own this time, just to test her limits. She looks at you in confusion for a while, before smiling when she realized what you wanted. She turned around so her rear end was right in front of your face, giving you a front-row seat for what was about to happen.

Rosie closed her eyes and gritted her teeth as she clenched around her prey, and the piglet was pulled deeper inside at a stunning speed. You were vaguely aware that a horse’s anus was composed of a complex array of rings and muscles, which must be how she was able to ‘swallow’ all her prey with such ease.

You could faintly hear, through the layers of fat, the piglet let out a startled squeal as it was suddenly pulled forward. Before you knew it, Rosie’s anus squeezed easily over the piglet’s hind legs, and the piglet was completely enveloped within her body. She was so large, the piglet didn’t even leave a bulge on her side as it was sucked through her intestines.

Rosie pants as the walls of her rectum undulated and pulled the piglet deeper and deeper. You could feel your heart fluttering in your chest and your body growing warm and dizzy as you watched her anus return to its normal state, as if none of this had ever happened. Maybe you were enjoying this too much.

After the previous piglets were done squirming, Rosie turned to you again. She was about ready to finish this up.

You go to grab the last of the piglets. This one’s a little smarter than the others, and could apparently tell that something was wrong. It took you a while to catch it while it darts around its pen, and even when you have it in your hands, it squirms and squeals so much you almost drop it.

You rush back to Rosie, having no time to spare this time around. You swear, you could hear Rosie giggling as you desperately tried to piglet in your grip. You hurried around to her rear end, and forcefully slammed the piglet’s snout into the mare’s ass, which eagerly stretched out to imprison it.

You grab the piglet’s flanks, and shove it deeper and deeper with all your strength… but, with all it’s struggling, you definitely weren’t making much progress. Just as you were about to give up, Rosie suddenly pulled the pig inside with her incredibly powerful anal muscles with a loud shlick, knocking you off balance and taking your arms with it!

As the piglet slipped from your hands and was dragged deeper into Rosie’s bowels, you were buried, elbow-deep in the mare’s ass. You tried to pull free, but she clenched around your arms playfully, enjoying the feeling of your fingers tickling her insides. She could overpower you with her ass alone! She was always a big horse, but you didn’t know she was this strong.

You rest your head against her pudgy rear end in frustration, trying futilely to tug your arms out. After a few moments, Rosie finally relents, letting your arms slide out easily. Luckily, upon inspecting your newly-freed arms, you find that they’re still completely clean -- they don’t even smell!

“This all just can’t be possible...” you breathe. The more you witness, the less all of this makes sense. In response, the mare only giggled again, and trotted off, satisfied as her new meals digest inside of her powerful body. You watch her leave, almost hypnotized by her immense, plush ass.

Finally, you were alone again, left to ruminate on what you had done. It made you feel kind of dirty, but it was also kind of… exciting, somehow. You try to push those feelings aside in your mind, of course. This was all strictly to ensure her success in the race.

You go about your business, trying to put that whole thing aside. Unfortunately, you run into some more trouble...

1551.content:
An old thing, but far from obsolete, the bus’ wheel screeched as the mighty vehicle slowed itself to a stop. The doors folded open to reveal quite the rundown bus stop, empty of everything except dust, bugs, and the silky homes of those that fed on them.

“Last stop.” The driver said to his only remaining passenger: you. He glanced out at the destination, the final one before he and his metal partner were to return to station, and then at you. “Never had anyone want to come to this out-of-the-way place before. Planning anything in particular?”

You shoot him a small smile. “Just looking for some inspiration.” You say, and hand him a few extra coins for his service. You pluck your bag from up off the floor and secure it to your back, before moving towards the waiting portal to the outside world.

Two steps is all it takes for your feet to met the cold, gray stone of the sidewalk. It’s a calm day – not beautiful or sunny, but not windy or rainy either. Just a few clouds in the sky and a pleasant breeze washing over you as it passed on through. A decent enough day to do what you had came to do.

From behind, you hear the bus’ doors fold shut and the wheels screech once more as it again sprung to life. It departed, and had you turned to watch it go, you would have seen it quickly disappear off into the distance. But you weren’t the slightest interested in that old machine. It was the world around you that held all your interest.

With a deep breath, you begin your trek, going around the abandoned bus stop and towards what lurked behind it. That was your destination, your objective. Where, hopefully, you’d find what you wanted to find…

info.description:
All about horses. All types of horses of all ages, sizes, ect. Since horses seem like everyone's favorite animal, I am putting few restrictions on, keep gore/blood to a minimum. Some blood is fine, just not full on disembowelment, like major injury. If you REALLY want to add something gory, please, PUT A WARNING IN BOLD. Like that.

The only other thing I ask is that options are kept open because there are many different things horses can do to you. This is so everyone can add their own versions and ideas. I strongly encourage you to add on and have fun because I am running out of ideas that are horse related, so, yeah, add on even if it is only one chapter. Nothing will be deleted unless you disobey rules or put little to no effort into it.

At 4,500 views, I am quite pleased with this story, but once again, few have added anything, which surprises me. By what I have seen in other interactives and stories, horses are everyone's favorite animal for vore, unbirth, sex, ect. So if you have ideas, show them off!
